title: [COSPLAY] PAX Australia 2014

embed.description: Check out some of the awesome cosplayers we found at PAX Australia 2014! Special thanks to Deerstalker Pictures (https://www.youtube.com/user/deerstalkerpictures).

body:
Hey guys! We're excited to unveil a video featuring some of the amazing cosplayers that we met at PAX Australia 2014. Check it out! 

What's the coolest League of Legends cosplay you've seen?

replies.body: This right here, is one of the many reasons my husband and I cosplay. We are happy to retire my Tristana @ 2:12 and my husband retiring his Garen @ 2:37,  after seeing this epic video. I really want to thank Riot and Deerstalker for making such a great video. And to everyone of our friends also featured here, I say...good job all!!! Here's to another great year of cosplaying and league of legends! Cheers!

I enjoyed watching the whole video! Fun stuff.

I also liked seeing just as many guys getting into the cosplays as girls.

Can you believe there is a name for that apparently?
Unless I was trolled, it's called "crossplaying"

there is "crossplay" and there is "genderbend"

One is having a girl version of the male character and vice versa, and the other is ahri with a beard. 

I cant remember which is which tho.

"Crossplay" is when a person cosplays a character of the opposite gender, so for example a guy cosplaying Ahri, whereas "genderbend" is when a person cosplays a character as if they were the opposite gender than what they are, so for example a guy cosplays Ahri as if she was a guy.

I'm too scared to google it :P
You should do a Gangplank "crossplay", based on what I remember from your beard.

So much awesome! Borderline too much awesome... So much hard work went into these cosplays, was great to see them all in person! So many other great ones that aren't in this video, hope they are in the next!

Thank you RIOT for organising everything! <3 you. Special thanks to Riot Achenar & Riot Crucius for all your help with the Cosplayers.

Awesome work by Deerstalker Pictures. =) Your the greatest and most enjoyable to work with.
https://www.facebook.com/deerstalkerpictures

PAX was the most enjoyable con so far, meeting all the LOL fans, and Cosplayers. ~,~ Many new friends.
Cosplayers! Add me on FB,
https://www.facebook.com/onegai.ryu

{{champion:157}}

Why does no OCE stuff ever make it onto the actual Facebook and Youtube pages? Do you, like, not want to show the other servers how awesome we are or something? It's the same deal with our esports scene. You're completely keeping it underground. Like, Korea and sh*t aren't part of Riot games yet they still make it onto the LoL Esports schedule and news web pages.

EDIT: For the record, this is something that legitimately infuriates me. You claim there's no vested interest in the OCE scene but then the Esports team never even tries to get NA and EUW viewers. Seriously - get our Pro scene onto the Official LoL Esports Youtube channel because right now channels like EpicSkillShot are reaping all of the benefits BECAUSE NOBODY OVERSEAS EVEN KNOWS RIOT GAMES OCE HAS A YOUTUBE CHANNEL.
